>25%: Gift from the bank, you get 30.000
Your birthday, get 15.000 from each player
25%: Gilang the hacker hacks your bank account and loses 20.000
Due to the small amount of aid from the government, you only get a fortune block card
Your car is broken, pay 35.000 repair costs
You pick up the tax nerf card that Gilang dropped
You get 25.000 times the number on the selected coin
15%: You take 1 step back when being chased by debt collectors, then get caught and pay 30%
Home renovation, pay 30% of the total money
After being friends with Gilang for a long time, he gave you an anti tax card for fun
8%: Your catfish business is successful, profits increased by 50%. Then, Gilang stops by to buy catfish for 80.000
5%: Home Renovation TV Show gives you upgrade city card
You are dreaming about getting hit by truck and going to other world then get attack city card

>25%: You find 20.000 on the road, take the money or take 1 steps forward (choose)
25%: You chased by a monitor lizard, take 2 steps back
Go forward to the start or take a general fund card
You found gaming dice card under your PC desk
15%: It's halloween day, you head to someone else's city (random)
Gilang drops his ichi ocha, you have to take 1 steps back to return it
Try your luck, go to free parking or prison
Due to number of vehicles in Indonesia is >160 million, players are given nerf parking card so they dont travel often
8%: You are caught red-handed in corruption, go to jail & fined 90% of the total money
Your police neighbor gives you an anti jail card as a Christmas present
You get a surprise money of 200.000
5%: Home Renovation TV Show gives you upgrade city card
You are dreaming about getting hit by truck and going to other world then get attack city card

reminder: Each card can only be used once
Cannot have 2 same card, if you get 2x anti tax card it'll only count as 1
page 1: Anti Prison = when you step on prison tile, you can avoid imprisoned effect
Anti Tax = avoid paying tax on stepping someone's city
Gaming Dice = get money 10.000 * dice number
Nerf Parking = your tile selection on stepping free parking is 40% less
page 2: Fortune Block = when passing start line, only get 5000
Upgrade City = can upgrade your city without getting there, but random
Attack City = can attack other player city
Curse Reverser = make cursed city effect to be reversed, everyone lose money (50% price) except card owner

page_1: to get out of prison, player must accumulate dice number
accumulated dice number can be seen in prison tile tooltip
game with 1 dice must accumulate > 6 dice number
game with 2 dice must accumulate > 12 dice number
there is bug where player cannot be imprisoned, good luck 😎

page 1: minigame can only be played on start tile
player will get minigame chance every 3 laps
when someone start the minigame, others can play it too
page 2: if player 1 answer with "apple" then player 2 using the same answer, it will be considered "wrong"

page_1: this game still have some weird bugs, maybe because i only use free stuff
sometimes player missing game data, but can only retrieve city, card, buff & debuff
player cannot roll dice if missing data still exist
to get missing data, click on player tab > burger icon > missing data
